org.cloudifysource.dsl.cloud
Class CloudTemplateInstallerConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.dsl.cloud.CloudTemplateInstallerConfiguration

public class CloudTemplateInstallerConfiguration
extends Object

DSL POJO for template specific installer settings, like connection timeouts and retries. Uses sensible default - most templates should not need to set this.

Since:
2.5.0
Author:
barakme
